title: @Riot (SSW Thresh) Why did you decide to revert the blue colour on a blue skin?
body:
Mata: Thresh, 975 RP
New character model.
~~All particles color shifted to blue.~~
New recall animation. 

On surrender @ 20 it shows a line through it indicating that the change never went through even though it's a 975 RP Skin AND it's a blue skin. So why not have blue particles?

replies.body:
Hey Spotted Dog, as [Galetta's PBE post](http://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-pbe-feedback/FYLnxJjy-pbe-bugs-feedback-thread-ssw-championship-skins) mentions: 

*SSW Thresh's particles will not be shifted blue, the decision was made in house to leave them green to better separate SSW and Championship Thresh.*

my thoughts exactly

give it a blue green base, then desaturate it till it's a lovely off-white color
Didn't Mata want a red thresh?
He'd requested it, I believe. Blood Moon Thresh covered that base, though. :P
piece of sht just adding in an extra 225 rp for more sneaky $$$$$$

TBH that's a silly reason, like taking away Dark Val Diana's head gear because of Syndra kind of silly, if colors can't be made to work because of being similar to another skin then scrap the new one altogether, there is no point in hurting one for an imagined harm to another,

Either revert or pick a different, new color.

Like Fated or Thryale above me have stated.

You guys jacked this up worse again :-/, just like with the blonde hair on Ace of Spades Ezreal.
